page.title: 15FARM MACHINERY IN SAMPFORD
page.content: We live an arable area.We have very many farms which use a wide variety of machines.These can be seen every day in use or at rest. {THE MACHINE YEAR} Combine Harvesters come in many various makes,colours and sizes colours but they all peform the same task.It cuts the standing crop,threashes it and collects the crop in a storage tank. The bayler is pulled by a tractor,it collects the loose straws and packs into bales and ties it with binder twine. The baler sledge collects the bales as the bayler spits them out.It lays them in a pattern of eight on the field.It is towed behind the bayler.
